articles.title: Brisbane Heat, Chris Lynn fined by Cricket Australia for coronavirus protocol breaches - ABC News
articles.description: The Heat are hit with a hefty fine, and captain Chris Lynn and teammate Dan Lawrence are also handed financial sanctions under Cricket Australia's code of conduct.

Cricket Australia (CA) has fined the Brisbane Heat and two of their players, Chris Lynn and Dan Lawrence, for multiple breaches of the Big Bash League's (BBL) COVID-19 protocols.
